`SUPABASE_URL=https://jerylujyofmmjukwlwvn.supabase.co SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJpc3MiOiJzdXBhYmFzZSIsInJlZiI6ImplcnlsdWp5b2ZtbWp1a3dsd3ZuIiwicm9sZSI6InNlcnZpY2Vfcm9sZSIsImlhdCI6MTc1NDQyNTE1MCwiZXhwIjoyMDcwMDAxMTUwfQ.09zsgogOOCZeaJ9R6K5D4q2_jzKXFh54f-CNBfwrEQc node -e "
const { createClient } = require('@supabase/supabase-js');
const supabase = createClient(process.env.SUPABASE_URL, process.env.SUPABASE_SERVICE_ROLE_KEY);

async function executeRootDomainSQL() {
  try {
    console.log('üîß Executing root domain SQL setup...');
    
    // Step 1: Add the column
    console.log('1Ô∏è‚É£ Adding k_root_domain column...');
    const addColumnSQL = 'ALTER TABLE zhe_serp_results ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS k_root_domain TEXT;';
    
    // Step 2: Create the extraction function
    console.log('2Ô∏è‚É£ Creating root domain extraction function...');
    const createFunctionSQL = \`
    CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION extract_root_domain(full_domain TEXT)
    RETURNS TEXT AS \$\$
    DECLARE
        domain_parts TEXT[];
        num_parts INTEGER;
        result TEXT;
    BEGIN
        IF full_domain IS NULL OR full_domain = '' THEN
            RETURN NULL;
        END IF;
        
        full_domain := LOWER(TRIM(full_domain));
        domain_parts := string_to_array(full_domain, '.');
        num_parts := array_length(domain_parts, 1);
        
        IF num_parts < 2 THEN
            RETURN full_domain;
        END IF;
        
        IF num_parts >= 3 THEN
            IF (domain_parts[num_parts-1] || '.' || domain_parts[num_parts]) IN (
                'co.uk', 'co.nz', 'co.za', 'co.in', 'co.jp', 'co.kr', 'co.th', 'co.id',
                'com.au', 'com.br', 'com.cn', 'com.mx', 'com.tw', 'com.ar', 'com.sg',
                'net.au', 'net.br', 'net.cn', 'net.mx', 'net.tw', 'net.ar', 'net.nz',
                'org.uk', 'org.au', 'org.nz', 'org.br', 'org.cn', 'org.mx', 'org.tw',
                'gov.uk', 'gov.au', 'gov.br', 'gov.cn', 'gov.in', 'gov.sg', 'gov.za',
                'ac.uk', 'ac.nz', 'ac.za', 'ac.jp', 'ac.in', 'ac.kr', 'ac.th',
                'edu.au', 'edu.br', 'edu.cn', 'edu.mx', 'edu.sg', 'edu.tw', 'edu.in'
            ) THEN
                result := domain_parts[num_parts-2] || '.' || domain_parts[num_parts-1] || '.' || domain_parts[num_parts];
            ELSE
                result := domain_parts[num_parts-1] || '.' || domain_parts[num_parts];
            END IF;
        ELSE
            result := full_domain;
        END IF;
        
        RETURN result;
    END;
    \$\$ LANGUAGE plpgsql IMMUTABLE;
    \`;
    
    // Execute SQL commands via RPC
    const { error: addError } = await supabase.rpc('exec_sql', { query: addColumnSQL });
    if (addError && !addError.message.includes('already exists')) {
      throw addError;
    }
    console.log('‚úÖ Column added successfully');
    
    const { error: funcError } = await supabase.rpc('exec_sql', { query: createFunctionSQL });
    if (funcError) throw funcError;
    console.log('‚úÖ Function created successfully');
    
    // Step 3: Create triggers
    console.log('3Ô∏è‚É£ Creating triggers...');
    const triggerSQL = \`
    CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION update_root_domain_trigger()
    RETURNS TRIGGER AS \$\$
    BEGIN
        IF NEW.domain IS NOT NULL AND NEW.domain != '' THEN
            NEW.k_root_domain := extract_root_domain(NEW.domain);
        END IF;
        RETURN NEW;
    END;
    \$\$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;
    
    DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS zhe_serp_results_insert_root_domain ON zhe_serp_results;
    CREATE TRIGGER zhe_serp_results_insert_root_domain
        BEFORE INSERT ON zhe_serp_results
        FOR EACH ROW
        EXECUTE FUNCTION update_root_domain_trigger();
    
    DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS zhe_serp_results_update_root_domain ON zhe_serp_results;
    CREATE TRIGGER zhe_serp_results_update_root_domain
        BEFORE UPDATE OF domain ON zhe_serp_results
        FOR EACH ROW
        WHEN (NEW.domain IS DISTINCT FROM OLD.domain)
        EXECUTE FUNCTION update_root_domain_trigger();
    \`;
    
    const { error: triggerError } = await supabase.rpc('exec_sql', { query: triggerSQL });
    if (triggerError) throw triggerError;
    console.log('‚úÖ Triggers created successfully');
    
    // Step 4: Update existing records
    console.log('4Ô∏è‚É£ Updating existing records...');
    const updateSQL = \`
    UPDATE zhe_serp_results 
    SET k_root_domain = extract_root_domain(domain)
    WHERE domain IS NOT NULL AND domain != '' AND k_root_domain IS NULL;
    \`;
    
    const { error: updateError } = await supabase.rpc('exec_sql', { query: updateSQL });
    if (updateError) throw updateError;
    console.log('‚úÖ Existing records updated successfully');
    
    console.log('üéâ Root domain extraction setup complete!');
    
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('‚ùå Error:', error.message);
  }
}

executeRootDomainSQL();
"`

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Here's the complete SQL for the trigger with `zhe_` naming:

```sql
-- Create a function to extract root domain from a full domain
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION extract_root_domain(full_domain TEXT)
RETURNS TEXT AS $$
DECLARE
    domain_parts TEXT[];
    num_parts INTEGER;
    result TEXT;
BEGIN
    -- Handle null or empty input
    IF full_domain IS NULL OR full_domain = '' THEN
        RETURN NULL;
    END IF;
    
    -- Convert to lowercase for consistency
    full_domain := LOWER(TRIM(full_domain));
    
    -- Split domain by dots
    domain_parts := string_to_array(full_domain, '.');
    num_parts := array_length(domain_parts, 1);
    
    -- Handle invalid domains
    IF num_parts < 2 THEN
        RETURN full_domain;
    END IF;
    
    -- Check for known multi-part TLDs
    -- This list covers the most common multi-part TLDs
    IF num_parts >= 3 THEN
        -- Check for common two-part TLDs
        IF (domain_parts[num_parts-1] || '.' || domain_parts[num_parts]) IN (
            'co.uk', 'co.nz', 'co.za', 'co.in', 'co.jp', 'co.kr', 'co.th', 'co.id',
            'com.au', 'com.br', 'com.cn', 'com.mx', 'com.tw', 'com.ar', 'com.sg',
            'net.au', 'net.br', 'net.cn', 'net.mx', 'net.tw', 'net.ar', 'net.nz',
            'org.uk', 'org.au', 'org.nz', 'org.br', 'org.cn', 'org.mx', 'org.tw',
            'gov.uk', 'gov.au', 'gov.br', 'gov.cn', 'gov.in', 'gov.sg', 'gov.za',
            'ac.uk', 'ac.nz', 'ac.za', 'ac.jp', 'ac.in', 'ac.kr', 'ac.th',
            'edu.au', 'edu.br', 'edu.cn', 'edu.mx', 'edu.sg', 'edu.tw', 'edu.in',
            'or.jp', 'ne.jp', 'gr.jp', 'go.jp', 'ac.jp', 'ad.jp', 'ed.jp', 'lg.jp',
            'me.uk', 'ltd.uk', 'plc.uk', 'sch.uk', 'nhs.uk', 'mil.uk', 'nic.uk',
            'asn.au', 'id.au', 'info.au', 'conf.au', 'oz.au', 'act.au', 'nsw.au',
            'nt.au', 'qld.au', 'sa.au', 'tas.au', 'vic.au', 'wa.au'
        ) THEN
            -- Return domain with two-part TLD (third-to-last . second-to-last . last)
            result := domain_parts[num_parts-2] || '.' || domain_parts[num_parts-1] || '.' || domain_parts[num_parts];
        ELSE
            -- Standard TLD, return last two parts
            result := domain_parts[num_parts-1] || '.' || domain_parts[num_parts];
        END IF;
    ELSE
        -- Only 2 parts, return as is
        result := full_domain;
    END IF;
    
    RETURN result;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql IMMUTABLE;

-- Create a trigger function to automatically populate k_root_domain
CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION zhe_update_root_domain_trigger()
RETURNS TRIGGER AS $$
BEGIN
    -- Only update if domain field has a value
    IF NEW.domain IS NOT NULL AND NEW.domain != '' THEN
        NEW.k_root_domain := extract_root_domain(NEW.domain);
    END IF;
    RETURN NEW;
END;
$$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

-- Create trigger for INSERT operations
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS zhe_serp_results_insert_root_domain ON zhe_serp_results;
CREATE TRIGGER zhe_serp_results_insert_root_domain
    BEFORE INSERT ON zhe_serp_results
    FOR EACH ROW
    EXECUTE FUNCTION zhe_update_root_domain_trigger();

-- Create trigger for UPDATE operations (when domain changes)
DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS zhe_serp_results_update_root_domain ON zhe_serp_results;
CREATE TRIGGER zhe_serp_results_update_root_domain
    BEFORE UPDATE OF domain ON zhe_serp_results
    FOR EACH ROW
    WHEN (NEW.domain IS DISTINCT FROM OLD.domain)
    EXECUTE FUNCTION zhe_update_root_domain_trigger();

-- Update existing records to populate k_root_domain
UPDATE zhe_serp_results 
SET k_root_domain = extract_root_domain(domain)
WHERE domain IS NOT NULL AND domain != '' AND k_root_domain IS NULL;

-- Test the function with some examples
SELECT 
    'www.dogs.com' as input,
    extract_root_domain('www.dogs.com') as output
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'parsons.jarls.cats.com' as input,
    extract_root_domain('parsons.jarls.cats.com') as output
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'www.example.co.uk' as input,
    extract_root_domain('www.example.co.uk') as output
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'subdomain.test.co.nz' as input,
    extract_root_domain('subdomain.test.co.nz') as output
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    'deep.sub.domain.example.com.au' as input,
    extract_root_domain('deep.sub.domain.example.com.au') as output;
```

This will:
1. Create the `extract_root_domain()` function that handles complex TLDs
2. Create the trigger function `zhe_update_root_domain_trigger()` 
3. Set up triggers for both INSERT and UPDATE operations with `zhe_` prefix names
4. Update all existing records to populate the k_root_domain field
5. Run test cases to verify it's working correctly

After running this, all new records will automatically get their root domain extracted, and existing records will be updated.

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Supabase is flagging it as "destructive" because of these specific lines in the main SQL:

1. **`DROP TRIGGER IF EXISTS`** statements - These will delete existing triggers if they exist
2. **`CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION`** statements - These will overwrite existing functions if they have the same name
3. **`UPDATE zhe_serp_results SET k_root_domain = ...`** - This modifies existing data in your table

The warning is just being cautious. Here's what could potentially be "destroyed":

- **Existing triggers** with the same names (if any exist)
- **Existing functions** with the same names (if any exist) 
- **Current k_root_domain values** in existing records (they'll be overwritten with new extracted values)

Since we're intentionally creating new functionality and you just ran the cleanup SQL, it's safe to proceed. The warning is normal for any SQL that includes `DROP`, `CREATE OR REPLACE`, or `UPDATE` statements.

**It's safe to confirm and execute** - you're just creating the root domain extraction system as intended. The "destructive" operations are:
1. Replacing any old versions of these functions (intended)
2. Updating existing records to populate k_root_domain (intended)
3. Dropping old triggers to create new ones (intended)

Go ahead and confirm the execution!

   103‚Üí      setLoading(false);

   110‚Üí      if (!searchTerm) return true;
   111‚Üí      return Object.values(item).some(value => 
   112‚Üí        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
   113‚Üí      );
   114‚Üí    });
   115‚Üí
   116‚Üí    // Sort data
   117‚Üí    filtered.sort((a, b) => {
   118‚Üí      const aValue = a[sortField];
   119‚Üí      const bValue = b[sortField];
   120‚Üí      
   121‚Üí      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
   122‚Üí      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   123‚Üí      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   124‚Üí      
   125‚Üí      // Handle numerical string values for rank columns
   126‚Üí      const numericalFields = ['rank_in_group', 'rank_absolute', 'result_id', 'rel_fetch_id'];
   127‚Üí      if (numericalFields.includes(sortField as string)) {
   128‚Üí        const aNum = parseInt(aValue?.toString() || '0', 10);
   129‚Üí        const bNum = parseInt(bValue?.toString() || '0', 10);
   130‚Üí        
   131‚Üí        // Handle NaN cases (non-numeric strings)
   132‚Üí        if (isNaN(aNum) && isNaN(bNum)) return 0;
   133‚Üí        if (isNaN(aNum)) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   134‚Üí        if (isNaN(bNum)) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   135‚Üí        
   136‚Üí        if (aNum < bNum) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   137‚Üí        if (aNum > bNum) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   138‚Üí        return 0;
   139‚Üí      }
   140‚Üí      
   141‚Üí      // Handle timestamp fields
   142‚Üí      if (sortField === 'created_at') {
   143‚Üí        const aTime = new Date(aValue as string).getTime();
   144‚Üí        const bTime = new Date(bValue as string).getTime();
   145‚Üí        
   146‚Üí        if (aTime < bTime) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   147‚Üí        if (aTime > bTime) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   148‚Üí        return 0;
   149‚Üí      }
   150‚Üí      
   151‚Üí      // Handle boolean fields
   152‚Üí      if (typeof aValue === 'boolean' || typeof bValue === 'boolean') {
   153‚Üí        const aBool = aValue === true ? 1 : aValue === false ? 0 : -1;
   154‚Üí        const bBool = bValue === true ? 1 : bValue === false ? 0 : -1;
   155‚Üí        
   156‚Üí        if (aBool < bBool) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   157‚Üí        if (aBool > bBool) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   158‚Üí        return 0;
   159‚Üí      }
   160‚Üí      
   161‚Üí      // Default string comparison (case-insensitive)
   162‚Üí      const aStr = (aValue?.toString() || '').toLowerCase();
   163‚Üí      const bStr = (bValue?.toString() || '').toLowerCase();
   164‚Üí      
   165‚Üí      if (aStr < bStr) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   166‚Üí      if (aStr > bStr) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   167‚Üí      return 0;
   168‚Üí    });
   169‚Üí
   170‚Üí    return filtered;
   171‚Üí  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder]);
   172‚Üí
   173‚Üí  // Pagination
   174‚Üí  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / itemsPerPage);
   175‚Üí  const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
   176‚Üí  const paginatedData = filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, startIndex + itemsPerPage);
   177‚Üí
   178‚Üí  // Handle sort
   179‚Üí  const handleSort = (field: keyof SerpResult) => {
   180‚Üí    if (sortField === field) {
   181‚Üí      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
   182‚Üí    } else {
   183‚Üí      setSortField(field);
   184‚Üí      setSortOrder('asc');
   185‚Üí    }
   186‚Üí  };
   187‚Üí
   188‚Üí  // Handle row selection
   189‚Üí  const handleRowSelect = (id: number) => {
   190‚Üí    const newSelected = new Set(selectedRows);
   191‚Üí    if (newSelected.has(id)) {
   192‚Üí      newSelected.delete(id);
   193‚Üí    } else {
   194‚Üí      newSelected.add(id);
   195‚Üí    }
   196‚Üí    setSelectedRows(newSelected);
   197‚Üí  };
   198‚Üí
   199‚Üí  // Handle select all
   200‚Üí  const handleSelectAll = () => {
   201‚Üí    if (selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length) {
   202‚Üí      setSelectedRows(new Set());
   203‚Üí    } else {
   204‚Üí      setSelectedRows(new Set(paginatedData.map(item => item.result_id)));
   205‚Üí    }
   206‚Üí  };
   207‚Üí
   208‚Üí  // Inline editing functions
   209‚Üí  const startEditing = (id: number, field: string, currentValue: any) => {
   210‚Üí    setEditingCell({ id, field });
   211‚Üí    setEditingValue(currentValue?.toString() || '');
   212‚Üí  };
   213‚Üí
   214‚Üí  const saveEdit = async () => {
   215‚Üí    if (!editingCell) return;
   216‚Üí    
   217‚Üí    try {
   218‚Üí      let value: any = editingValue;
   219‚Üí      
   220‚Üí      // Convert value based on field type
   221‚Üí      const column = columns.find(col => col.key === editingCell.field);
   222‚Üí      if (column?.type === 'integer' || column?.type === 'number') {
   223‚Üí        value = editingValue === '' ? null : Number(editingValue);
   224‚Üí      } else if (column?.type === 'boolean') {
   225‚Üí        value = editingValue === 'true' ? true : editingValue === 'false' ? false : null;
   226‚Üí      }
   227‚Üí
   228‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/zhe_serp_results', {
   229‚Üí        method: 'PUT',
   230‚Üí        headers: {
   231‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   232‚Üí        },
   233‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({
   234‚Üí          result_id: editingCell.id,
   235‚Üí          [editingCell.field]: value
   236‚Üí        }),
   237‚Üí      });
   238‚Üí
   239‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
   240‚Üí
   241‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   242‚Üí        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to update');
   243‚Üí      }
   244‚Üí
   245‚Üí      // Update local data
   246‚Üí      setData(prevData => 
   247‚Üí        prevData.map(item => 
   248‚Üí          item.result_id === editingCell.id 
   249‚Üí            ? { ...item, [editingCell.field]: value }
   250‚Üí            : item
   251‚Üí        )
   252‚Üí      );
   253‚Üí
   254‚Üí      setEditingCell(null);
   255‚Üí      setEditingValue('');
   256‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   257‚Üí      console.error('Error updating field:', error);
   258‚Üí      alert('Failed to update field');
   259‚Üí    }
   260‚Üí  };
   261‚Üí
   262‚Üí  const cancelEdit = () => {
   263‚Üí    setEditingCell(null);
   264‚Üí    setEditingValue('');
   265‚Üí  };
   266‚Üí
   267‚Üí  // Handle boolean toggle
   268‚Üí  const handleBooleanToggle = async (id: number, field: keyof SerpResult, currentValue: boolean | null) => {
   269‚Üí    const newValue = currentValue === null ? true : !currentValue;
   270‚Üí    
   271‚Üí    try {
   272‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/zhe_serp_results', {
   273‚Üí        method: 'PUT',
   274‚Üí        headers: {
   275‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   276‚Üí        },
   277‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({
   278‚Üí          result_id: id,
   279‚Üí          [field]: newValue
   280‚Üí        }),
   281‚Üí      });
   282‚Üí
   283‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
   284‚Üí
   285‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   286‚Üí        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to update');
   287‚Üí      }
   288‚Üí
   289‚Üí      // Update local data
   290‚Üí      setData(prevData => 
   291‚Üí        prevData.map(item => 
   292‚Üí          item.result_id === id ? { ...item, [field]: newValue } : item
   293‚Üí        )
   294‚Üí      );
   295‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   296‚Üí      console.error('Error toggling boolean:', error);
   297‚Üí      alert('Failed to update field');
   298‚Üí    }
   299‚Üí  };
   300‚Üí
   301‚Üí  // Render cell content
   302‚Üí  const renderCell = (item: SerpResult, column: typeof columns[0]) => {
   303‚Üí    const value = item[column.key as keyof SerpResult];
   304‚Üí    const isEditing = editingCell?.id === item.result_id && editingCell?.field === column.key;
   305‚Üí    const isReadOnly = column.key === 'result_id' || column.key === 'created_at';
   306‚Üí
   307‚Üí    // Handle boolean column type
   308‚Üí    if (column.type === 'boolean' && !isReadOnly) {
   309‚Üí      return (
   310‚Üí        <div className="px-2 py-1 flex items-center justify-center">
   311‚Üí          <button
   312‚Üí            onClick={() => handleBooleanToggle(item.result_id, column.key, value as boolean | null)}
   313‚Üí            className={`w-12 h-6 rounded-full transition-colors ${
   314‚Üí              value === true ? 'bg-green-500' : 
   315‚Üí              value === false ? 'bg-gray-300' : 'bg-yellow-300'
   316‚Üí            }`}
   317‚Üí          >
   318‚Üí            <div className={`w-5 h-5 bg-white rounded-full transition-transform ${
   319‚Üí              value === true ? 'translate-x-6' : 
   320‚Üí              value === false ? 'translate-x-1' : 'translate-x-3'
   321‚Üí            }`} />
   322‚Üí          </button>
   323‚Üí        </div>
   324‚Üí      );
   325‚Üí    }
   326‚Üí
   327‚Üí    if (isEditing && !isReadOnly) {
   328‚Üí      return (
   329‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
   330‚Üí          <input
   331‚Üí            type={column.type === 'integer' || column.type === 'number' ? 'number' : 'text'}
   332‚Üí            value={editingValue}
   333‚Üí            onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
   334‚Üí            onKeyDown={(e) => {
   335‚Üí              if (e.key === 'Enter') saveEdit();
   336‚Üí              if (e.key === 'Escape') cancelEdit();
   337‚Üí            }}
   338‚Üí            className="w-full px-2 py-1 text-xs border border-blue-500 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500"
   339‚Üí            autoFocus
   340‚Üí          />
   341‚Üí          <button
   342‚Üí            onClick={saveEdit}
   343‚Üí            className="text-green-600 hover:text-green-800 text-xs"
   344‚Üí          >
   345‚Üí            ‚úì
   346‚Üí          </button>
   347‚Üí          <button
   348‚Üí            onClick={cancelEdit}
   349‚Üí            className="text-red-600 hover:text-red-800 text-xs"
   350‚Üí          >
   351‚Üí            ‚úï
   352‚Üí          </button>
   353‚Üí        </div>
   354‚Üí      );
   355‚Üí    }
   356‚Üí
   357‚Üí    const cellClass = "px-2 py-1 cursor-pointer hover:bg-blue-50 text-xs";
   358‚Üí    
   359‚Üí    if (column.type === 'timestamp' && value) {
   360‚Üí      return (
   361‚Üí        <div
   362‚Üí          className={cellClass}
   363‚Üí          onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.result_id, column.key, value)}
   364‚Üí        >
   365‚Üí          {new Date(value as string).toLocaleString()}
   366‚Üí        </div>
   367‚Üí      );
   368‚Üí    }
   369‚Üí
   370‚Üí    if ((column.type === 'integer' || column.type === 'number') && value !== null) {
   371‚Üí      return (
   372‚Üí        <div
   373‚Üí          className={cellClass}
   374‚Üí          onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.result_id, column.key, value)}
   375‚Üí        >
   376‚Üí          {typeof value === 'number' ? value.toLocaleString() : value}
   377‚Üí        </div>
   378‚Üí      );
   379‚Üí    }
   380‚Üí
   381‚Üí    return (
   382‚Üí      <div
   383‚Üí        className={cellClass}
   384‚Üí        onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.result_id, column.key, value)}
   385‚Üí      >
   386‚Üí        {value?.toString() || ''}
   387‚Üí      </div>
   388‚Üí    );
   389‚Üí  };
   390‚Üí
   391‚Üí  // Pagination Controls Component - Matching /filejar style
   392‚Üí  const PaginationControls = () => {
   393‚Üí    // Always show pagination controls
   394‚Üí    
   395‚Üí    return (
   396‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center">
   397‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center">
   398‚Üí          <button
   399‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   400‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(10);
   401‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
   402‚Üí            }}
   403‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-l -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 10 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
   404‚Üí          >
   405‚Üí            10
   406‚Üí          </button>
   407‚Üí          <button
   408‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   409‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(20);
   410‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
   411‚Üí            }}
   412‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 20 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
   413‚Üí          >
   414‚Üí            20
   415‚Üí          </button>
   416‚Üí          <button
   417‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   418‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(50);
   419‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
   420‚Üí            }}
   421‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 50 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
   422‚Üí          >
   423‚Üí            50
   424‚Üí          </button>
   425‚Üí          <button
   426‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   427‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(100);
   428‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
   429‚Üí            }}
   430‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 100 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
   431‚Üí          >
   432‚Üí            100
   433‚Üí          </button>
   434‚Üí          <button
   435‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   436‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(200);
   437‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
   438‚Üí            }}
   439‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 200 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
   440‚Üí          >
   441‚Üí            200
   442‚Üí          </button>
   443‚Üí          <button
   444‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   445‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(500);
   446‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
   447‚Üí            }}
   448‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === 500 ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
   449‚Üí          >
   450‚Üí            500
   451‚Üí          </button>
   452‚Üí          <button
   453‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   454‚Üí              setItemsPerPage(filteredAndSortedData.length);
   455‚Üí              setCurrentPage(1);
   456‚Üí            }}
   457‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-r cursor-pointer ${itemsPerPage === filteredAndSortedData.length ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'}`}
   458‚Üí          >
   459‚Üí            All
   460‚Üí          </button>
   461‚Üí        </div>
   462‚Üí        <div className="border-l border-gray-300 pl-2 ml-2">
   463‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center">
   464‚Üí            <button
   465‚Üí              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(1)}
   466‚Üí              disabled={currentPage === 1}
   467‚Üí              className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-l -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   468‚Üí            >
   469‚Üí              First
   470‚Üí            </button>
   471‚Üí            <button
   472‚Üí              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(currentPage - 1)}
   473‚Üí              disabled={currentPage === 1}
   474‚Üí              className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   475‚Üí            >
   476‚Üí              Prev
   477‚Üí            </button>
   478‚Üí            
   479‚Üí            {Array.from({ length: Math.min(5, totalPages) }, (_, i) => {
   480‚Üí              const pageNum = Math.max(1, Math.min(totalPages - 4, currentPage - 2)) + i;
   481‚Üí              if (pageNum > totalPages) return null;
   482‚Üí              return (
   483‚Üí                <button
   484‚Üí                  key={pageNum}
   485‚Üí                  onClick={() => setCurrentPage(pageNum)}
   486‚Üí                  className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   487‚Üí                    currentPage === pageNum 
   488‚Üí                      ? 'bg-blue-500 text-white border-blue-500' 
   489‚Üí                      : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   490‚Üí                  }`}
   491‚Üí                >
   492‚Üí                  {pageNum}
   493‚Üí                </button>
   494‚Üí              );
   495‚Üí            })}
   496‚Üí            
   497‚Üí            <button
   498‚Üí              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(currentPage + 1)}
   499‚Üí              disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
   500‚Üí              className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   501‚Üí            >
   502‚Üí              Next
   503‚Üí            </button>
   504‚Üí            <button
   505‚Üí              onClick={() => setCurrentPage(totalPages)}
   506‚Üí              disabled={currentPage === totalPages}
   507‚Üí              className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-r disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   508‚Üí            >
   509‚Üí              Last
   510‚Üí            </button>
   511‚Üí          </div>
   512‚Üí        </div>
   513‚Üí      </div>
   514‚Üí    );
   515‚Üí  };
   516‚Üí
   517‚Üí  if (loading) {
   518‚Üí    return (
   519‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-64">
   520‚Üí        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading SERP results...</div>
   521‚Üí      </div>
   522‚Üí    );
   523‚Üí  }
   524‚Üí
   525‚Üí  if (error) {
   526‚Üí    return (
   527‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-64">
   528‚Üí        <div className="text-red-500">Error: {error}</div>
   529‚Üí      </div>
   530‚Üí    );
   531‚Üí  }
   532‚Üí
   533‚Üí  if (data.length === 0 && keywordId) {
   534‚Üí    return (
   535‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center justify-center h-64">
   536‚Üí        <div className="text-center">
   537‚Üí          <div className="text-gray-500 mb-2">No SERP results found for keyword_id: {keywordId}</div>
   538‚Üí          <div className="text-sm text-gray-400">
   539‚Üí            This keyword may not have been fetched yet. Use the F400 SERP Fetch button to get results.
   540‚Üí          </div>
   541‚Üí        </div>
   542‚Üí      </div>
   543‚Üí    );
   544‚Üí  }
   545‚Üí
   546‚Üí  return (
   547‚Üí    <div className="w-full">
   548‚Üí      {/* Top Header Area */}
   549‚Üí      <div className="bg-white border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-2 border-t-0">
   550‚Üí        <div className="flex justify-between items-center">
   551‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
   552‚Üí            <div className="text-sm text-gray-600">
   553‚Üí              {startIndex + 1}-{Math.min(startIndex + itemsPerPage, filteredAndSortedData.length)} of {filteredAndSortedData.length} results
   554‚Üí              {keywordId && (
   555‚Üí                <span className="ml-2 px-2 py-1 bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 rounded-md text-xs font-medium">
   556‚Üí                  Filtered by keyword_id: {keywordId}
   557‚Üí                </span>
   558‚Üí              )}
   559‚Üí              {keywordId && filteredAndSortedData.length === 0 && (
   560‚Üí                <span className="ml-2 px-2 py-1 bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 rounded-md text-xs font-medium">
   561‚Üí                  No results for this keyword
   562‚Üí                </span>
   563‚Üí              )}
   564‚Üí              {selectedRows.size > 0 && ` (${selectedRows.size} selected)`}
   565‚Üí            </div>
   566‚Üí            <NubraTablefaceKite text="nubra-tableface-kite" />
   567‚Üí            <PaginationControls />
   568‚Üí            <div className="relative">
   569‚Üí              <input
   570‚Üí                type="text"
   571‚Üí                placeholder="Search all fields..."
   572‚Üí                value={searchTerm}
   573‚Üí                onChange={(e) => {
   574‚Üí                  setSearchTerm(e.target.value);
   575‚Üí                  setCurrentPage(1);
   576‚Üí                }}
   577‚Üí                className="w-80 px-3 py-2 pr-12 border border-gray-300 rounded-md text-sm"
   578‚Üí              />
   579‚Üí              <button
   580‚Üí                onClick={() => {
   581‚Üí                  setSearchTerm('');
   582‚Üí                  setCurrentPage(1);
   583‚Üí                }}
   584‚Üí                className="absolute right-2 top-1/2 transform -translate-y-1/2 bg-yellow-400 hover:bg-yellow-500 text-black px-2 py-1 rounded text-xs font-medium"
   585‚Üí              >
   586‚Üí                CL
   587‚Üí              </button>
   588‚Üí            </div>
   589‚Üí          </div>
   590‚Üí          <div></div>
   591‚Üí        </div>
   592‚Üí        
   593‚Üí      </div>
   594‚Üí
   595‚Üí      {/* Table */}
   596‚Üí      <div className="bg-white overflow-hidden">
   597‚Üí        <div className="overflow-x-auto">
   598‚Üí          <table className="w-full border-collapse border border-gray-200" style={{ minWidth: '2000px' }}>
   599‚Üí            <thead className="bg-gray-50">
   600‚Üí              <tr>
   601‚Üí                <th className="px-2 py-3 text-left border border-gray-200" style={{ width: '20px' }}>
   602‚Üí                  <div 
   603‚Üí                    className="w-full h-full flex items-center justify-center cursor-pointer"
   604‚Üí                    style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
   605‚Üí                    onClick={handleSelectAll}
   606‚Üí                  >
   607‚Üí                    <div
   608‚Üí                      className={`w-full h-full border-2 flex items-center justify-center ${
   609‚Üí                        selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length && paginatedData.length > 0
   610‚Üí                          ? 'bg-blue-500 border-blue-500' 
   611‚Üí                          : 'border-gray-300 bg-white'
   612‚Üí                      }`}
   613‚Üí                      style={{ width: '20px', height: '20px' }}
   614‚Üí                    >
   615‚Üí                      {selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length && paginatedData.length > 0 && (
   616‚Üí                        <span className="text-white text-xs">‚úì</span>
   617‚Üí                      )}
   618‚Üí                    </div>
   619‚Üí                  </div>
   620‚Üí                </th>
   621‚Üí                {columns.map((column) => {
   622‚Üí                  const isReadOnly = column.key === 'result_id' || column.key === 'created_at';
   623‚Üí                  const isBooleanColumn = column.type === 'boolean';
   624‚Üí                  
   625‚Üí                  return (
   626‚Üí                    <th
   627‚Üí                      key={column.key}
   628‚Üí                      className={`text-left cursor-pointer hover:bg-gray-100 border border-gray-200 px-2 py-1 ${

1‚Üíimport { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server';
     2‚Üíimport { supabaseAdmin } from '@/lib/supabase-admin';
     3‚Üí
     4‚Üíexport async function GET(request: NextRequest) {
     5‚Üí  try {
     6‚Üí    const supabase = supabaseAdmin;
     7‚Üí    const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
     8‚Üí    const keywordId = searchParams.get('keyword_id');
     9‚Üí
    10‚Üí    let query;
    11‚Üí
    12‚Üí    if (keywordId) {
    13‚Üí      // Filter results by keyword_id using the relationship chain:
    14‚Üí      // zhe_serp_results.rel_fetch_id -> zhe_serp_fetches.rel_keyword_id -> keywordshub.keyword_id
    15‚Üí      console.log(`Filtering results for keyword_id: ${keywordId}`);
    16‚Üí      
    17‚Üí      // First get fetch_ids for this keyword_id
    18‚Üí      const { data: fetches, error: fetchError } = await supabase
    19‚Üí        .from('zhe_serp_fetches')
    20‚Üí        .select('fetch_id')
    21‚Üí        .eq('rel_keyword_id', parseInt(keywordId));
    22‚Üí
    23‚Üí      if (fetchError) {
    24‚Üí        console.error('Error fetching fetch_ids:', fetchError);
    25‚Üí        return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to fetch fetch data' }, { status: 500 });
    26‚Üí      }
    27‚Üí
    28‚Üí      if (!fetches || fetches.length === 0) {
    29‚Üí        console.log(`No fetches found for keyword_id: ${keywordId}`);
    30‚Üí        return NextResponse.json({ results: [] });
    31‚Üí      }
    32‚Üí
    33‚Üí      const fetchIds = fetches.map(f => f.fetch_id);
    34‚Üí      console.log(`Found ${fetchIds.length} fetch_ids: ${fetchIds.join(', ')}`);
    35‚Üí
    36‚Üí      // Now get results for these fetch_ids
    37‚Üí      query = supabase
    38‚Üí        .from('zhe_serp_results')
    39‚Üí        .select('*')
    40‚Üí        .in('rel_fetch_id', fetchIds)
    41‚Üí        .order('rank_absolute', { ascending: true, nullsLast: true });
    42‚Üí
    43‚Üí    } else {
    44‚Üí      // Fetch all serp results if no keyword_id specified
    45‚Üí      query = supabase
    46‚Üí        .from('zhe_serp_results')
    47‚Üí        .select('*')
    48‚Üí        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });
    49‚Üí    }
    50‚Üí
    51‚Üí    const { data: results, error } = await query;
    52‚Üí
    53‚Üí    if (error) {
    54‚Üí      console.error('Error fetching zhe_serp_results:', error);
    55‚Üí      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to fetch results' }, { status: 500 });
    56‚Üí    }
    57‚Üí
    58‚Üí    console.log(`Returning ${results?.length || 0} results`);
    59‚Üí    return NextResponse.json({ results });
    60‚Üí
    61‚Üí  } catch (error) {
    62‚Üí    console.error('API Error:', error);
    63‚Üí    return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
    64‚Üí  }
    65‚Üí}
    66‚Üí
    67‚Üíexport async function POST(request: NextRequest) {
    68‚Üí  try {
    69‚Üí    const body = await request.json();
    70‚Üí
    71‚Üí    const supabase = supabaseAdmin;
    72‚Üí
    73‚Üí    // Create new result
    74‚Üí    const { data: newResult, error } = await supabase
    75‚Üí      .from('zhe_serp_results')
    76‚Üí      .insert([body])
    77‚Üí      .select()
    78‚Üí      .single();
    79‚Üí
    80‚Üí    if (error) {
    81‚Üí      console.error('Error creating zhe_serp_result:', error);
    82‚Üí      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to create result' }, { status: 500 });
    83‚Üí    }
    84‚Üí
    85‚Üí    return NextResponse.json({ result: newResult });
    86‚Üí
    87‚Üí  } catch (error) {
    88‚Üí    console.error('API Error:', error);
    89‚Üí    return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
    90‚Üí  }
    91‚Üí}
    92‚Üí
    93‚Üíexport async function PUT(request: NextRequest) {
    94‚Üí  try {
    95‚Üí    const body = await request.json();
    96‚Üí    const { result_id, ...updateData } = body;
    97‚Üí
    98‚Üí    if (!result_id) {
    99‚Üí      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Result ID is required' }, { status: 400 });
   100‚Üí    }
   101‚Üí
   102‚Üí    const supabase = supabaseAdmin;
   103‚Üí
   104‚Üí    // Update the result
   105‚Üí    const { data: updatedResult, error } = await supabase
   106‚Üí      .from('zhe_serp_results')
   107‚Üí      .update(updateData)
   108‚Üí      .eq('result_id', result_id)
   109‚Üí      .select()
   110‚Üí      .single();
   111‚Üí
   112‚Üí    if (error) {
   113‚Üí      console.error('Error updating zhe_serp_result:', error);
   114‚Üí      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to update result' }, { status: 500 });
   115‚Üí    }
   116‚Üí
   117‚Üí    return NextResponse.json({ result: updatedResult });
   118‚Üí
   119‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   120‚Üí    console.error('API Error:', error);
   121‚Üí    return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
   122‚Üí  }
   123‚Üí}
   124‚Üí
   125‚Üíexport async function DELETE(request: NextRequest) {
   126‚Üí  try {
   127‚Üí    const { searchParams } = new URL(request.url);
   128‚Üí    const resultId = searchParams.get('result_id');
   129‚Üí
   130‚Üí    if (!resultId) {
   131‚Üí      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Result ID is required' }, { status: 400 });
   132‚Üí    }
   133‚Üí
   134‚Üí    const supabase = supabaseAdmin;
   135‚Üí
   136‚Üí    // Delete the result
   137‚Üí    const { error } = await supabase
   138‚Üí      .from('zhe_serp_results')
   139‚Üí      .delete()
   140‚Üí      .eq('result_id', resultId);
   141‚Üí
   142‚Üí    if (error) {
   143‚Üí      console.error('Error deleting zhe_serp_result:', error);
   144‚Üí      return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Failed to delete result' }, { status: 500 });
   145‚Üí    }
   146‚Üí
   147‚Üí    return NextResponse.json({ success: true });
   148‚Üí
   149‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   150‚Üí    console.error('API Error:', error);
   151‚Üí    return NextResponse.json({ error: 'Internal server error' }, { status: 500 });
   152‚Üí  }
   153‚Üí}

    81‚Üí

    89‚Üí  const { user } = useAuth();
    90‚Üí  const [data, setData] = useState<KeywordRecord[]>([]);
    91‚Üí  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    92‚Üí  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
    93‚Üí  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    94‚Üí  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
    95‚Üí  const [itemsPerPage, setItemsPerPage] = useState(100);
    96‚Üí  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
    97‚Üí  const [sortField, setSortField] = useState<keyof KeywordRecord>('created_at');
    98‚Üí  const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState<'asc' | 'desc'>('desc');
    99‚Üí  
   100‚Üí  // Column pagination states
   101‚Üí  const [columnsPerPage, setColumnsPerPage] = useState(initialColumnsPerPage); // Show 8 columns at a time
   102‚Üí  const [currentColumnPage, setCurrentColumnPage] = useState(initialColumnPage);
   103‚Üí  
   104‚Üí  // Modal states
   105‚Üí  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);
   106‚Üí  
   107‚Üí  // Inline editing states
   108‚Üí  const [editingCell, setEditingCell] = useState<{ id: number; field: string } | null>(null);
   109‚Üí  const [editingValue, setEditingValue] = useState<string>('');
   110‚Üí  
   111‚Üí  // DataForSEO refresh states
   112‚Üí  const [refreshingKeywords, setRefreshingKeywords] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
   113‚Üí  const [bulkRefreshing, setBulkRefreshing] = useState(false);
   114‚Üí  const [blankRefreshing, setBlankRefreshing] = useState(false);
   115‚Üí  const [reverseLookupRefreshing, setReverseLookupRefreshing] = useState(false);
   116‚Üí  
   117‚Üí  // Form data for creating
   118‚Üí  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
   119‚Üí    keyword_datum: '',
   120‚Üí    search_volume: 0,
   121‚Üí    cpc: 0,
   122‚Üí    rel_dfs_location_code: 2840,
   123‚Üí    location_display_name: '',
   124‚Üí    location_coordinate: '',
   125‚Üí    language_code: 'en',
   126‚Üí    language_name: 'English',
   127‚Üí    competition: '',
   128‚Üí    competition_index: 0,
   129‚Üí    low_top_of_page_bid: 0,
   130‚Üí    high_top_of_page_bid: 0
   131‚Üí  });
   132‚Üí
   133‚Üí  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();
   134‚Üí
   135‚Üí  // Get user ID
   136‚Üí  const [userInternalId, setUserInternalId] = useState<string | null>(null);
   137‚Üí
   138‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   139‚Üí    const getUserId = async () => {
   140‚Üí      if (user?.id) {
   141‚Üí        const { data: userData } = await supabase
   142‚Üí          .from('users')
   143‚Üí          .select('id')
   144‚Üí          .eq('auth_id', user.id)
   145‚Üí          .single();
   146‚Üí        
   147‚Üí        if (userData) {
   148‚Üí          setUserInternalId(userData.id);
   149‚Üí        }
   150‚Üí      }
   151‚Üí    };
   152‚Üí    getUserId();
   153‚Üí  }, [user, supabase]);
   154‚Üí
   155‚Üí  // Fetch data
   156‚Üí  const fetchData = async () => {
   157‚Üí    try {
   158‚Üí      setLoading(true);
   159‚Üí      
   160‚Üí      let query = supabase
   161‚Üí        .from('keywordshub')
   162‚Üí        .select('*');
   163‚Üí
   164‚Üí      // If a tag is selected, filter by keywords that have this tag
   165‚Üí      if (selectedTagId) {
   166‚Üí        // Get keyword IDs that have this tag
   167‚Üí        const { data: taggedKeywordIds, error: tagError } = await supabase
   168‚Üí          .from('keywordshub_tag_relations')
   169‚Üí          .select('fk_keyword_id')
   170‚Üí          .eq('fk_tag_id', selectedTagId);
   171‚Üí
   172‚Üí        if (tagError) throw tagError;
   173‚Üí
   174‚Üí        const keywordIds = taggedKeywordIds.map(rel => rel.fk_keyword_id);
   175‚Üí        
   176‚Üí        if (keywordIds.length > 0) {
   177‚Üí          query = query.in('keyword_id', keywordIds);
   178‚Üí        } else {
   179‚Üí          // No keywords have this tag, return empty array
   180‚Üí          setData([]);
   181‚Üí          setLoading(false);
   182‚Üí          return;
   183‚Üí        }
   184‚Üí      }
   185‚Üí
   186‚Üí      const { data: keywords, error } = await query.order('created_at', { ascending: false });
   187‚Üí
   188‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
   189‚Üí      
   190‚Üí      // Fetch tag information for each keyword
   191‚Üí      if (keywords && keywords.length > 0) {
   192‚Üí        const keywordIds = keywords.map(k => k.keyword_id);
   193‚Üí        
   194‚Üí        // Get all tag relations for these keywords
   195‚Üí        const { data: tagRelations, error: tagRelError } = await supabase
   196‚Üí          .from('keywordshub_tag_relations')
   197‚Üí          .select(`
   198‚Üí            fk_keyword_id,
   199‚Üí            keywordshub_tags (
   200‚Üí              tag_id,
   201‚Üí              tag_name
   202‚Üí            )
   203‚Üí          `)
   204‚Üí          .in('fk_keyword_id', keywordIds);
   205‚Üí        
   206‚Üí        if (tagRelError) {
   207‚Üí          console.error('Error fetching tag relations:', tagRelError);
   208‚Üí        }
   209‚Üí        
   210‚Üí        // Group tags by keyword_id
   211‚Üí        const tagsByKeywordId: Record<number, Array<{ tag_id: number; tag_name: string }>> = {};
   212‚Üí        
   213‚Üí        if (tagRelations) {
   214‚Üí          tagRelations.forEach(relation => {
   215‚Üí            const keywordId = relation.fk_keyword_id;
   216‚Üí            const tagInfo = relation.keywordshub_tags;
   217‚Üí            
   218‚Üí            if (tagInfo) {
   219‚Üí              if (!tagsByKeywordId[keywordId]) {
   220‚Üí                tagsByKeywordId[keywordId] = [];
   221‚Üí              }
   222‚Üí              tagsByKeywordId[keywordId].push({ tag_id: tagInfo.tag_id, tag_name: tagInfo.tag_name });
   223‚Üí            }
   224‚Üí          });
   225‚Üí        }
   226‚Üí        
   227‚Üí        // Add tags to keywords
   228‚Üí        const keywordsWithTags = keywords.map(keyword => ({
   229‚Üí          ...keyword,
   230‚Üí          tags: tagsByKeywordId[keyword.keyword_id] || []
   231‚Üí        }));
   232‚Üí        
   233‚Üí        setData(keywordsWithTags);
   234‚Üí      } else {
   235‚Üí        setData([]);
   236‚Üí      }
   237‚Üí    } catch (err) {
   238‚Üí      console.error('Error fetching keywords:', err);
   239‚Üí      setError(err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Failed to fetch data');
   240‚Üí    } finally {
   241‚Üí      setLoading(false);
   242‚Üí    }
   243‚Üí  };
   244‚Üí
   245‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   246‚Üí    fetchData();
   247‚Üí  }, [selectedTagId]);
   248‚Üí
   249‚Üí  // Filter and sort data
   250‚Üí  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
   251‚Üí    let filtered = data.filter(item => {
   252‚Üí      if (!searchTerm) return true;
   253‚Üí      return Object.values(item).some(value => 
   254‚Üí        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
   255‚Üí      );
   256‚Üí    });
   257‚Üí
   258‚Üí    // Sort data
   259‚Üí    filtered.sort((a, b) => {
   260‚Üí      const aValue = a[sortField];
   261‚Üí      const bValue = b[sortField];
   262‚Üí      
   263‚Üí      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
   264‚Üí      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   265‚Üí      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   266‚Üí      
   267‚Üí      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
   268‚Üí      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
   269‚Üí      return 0;
   270‚Üí    });
   271‚Üí
   272‚Üí    return filtered;
   273‚Üí  }, [data, searchTerm, sortField, sortOrder]);
   274‚Üí
   275‚Üí  // Pagination
   276‚Üí  const totalPages = Math.ceil(filteredAndSortedData.length / (itemsPerPage === 0 ? filteredAndSortedData.length : itemsPerPage));
   277‚Üí  const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * itemsPerPage;
   278‚Üí  const paginatedData = itemsPerPage === 0 ? filteredAndSortedData : filteredAndSortedData.slice(startIndex, startIndex + itemsPerPage);
   279‚Üí
   280‚Üí  // Column pagination logic with sticky columns
   281‚Üí  const stickyColumnKeys = ['serp_tool', 'keyword_id', 'keyword_datum', 'search_volume', 'cpc'];
   282‚Üí  const stickyColumns = columns.filter(col => stickyColumnKeys.includes(col.key));
   283‚Üí  const paginatedColumns = columns.filter(col => !stickyColumnKeys.includes(col.key));
   284‚Üí  
   285‚Üí  const totalColumnPages = columnsPerPage === 0 ? 1 : Math.ceil(paginatedColumns.length / columnsPerPage);
   286‚Üí  const startColumnIndex = columnsPerPage === 0 ? 0 : (currentColumnPage - 1) * columnsPerPage;
   287‚Üí  const visiblePaginatedColumns = columnsPerPage === 0 ? paginatedColumns : paginatedColumns.slice(startColumnIndex, startColumnIndex + columnsPerPage);
   288‚Üí  
   289‚Üí  // Combined visible columns: sticky columns + paginated columns
   290‚Üí  const visibleColumns = [...stickyColumns, ...visiblePaginatedColumns];
   291‚Üí
   292‚Üí  // Handle sort
   293‚Üí  const handleSort = (field: keyof KeywordRecord) => {
   294‚Üí    if (sortField === field) {
   295‚Üí      setSortOrder(sortOrder === 'asc' ? 'desc' : 'asc');
   296‚Üí    } else {
   297‚Üí      setSortField(field);
   298‚Üí      setSortOrder('asc');
   299‚Üí    }
   300‚Üí  };
   301‚Üí
   302‚Üí  // Handle row selection
   303‚Üí  const handleRowSelect = (id: number) => {
   304‚Üí    const newSelected = new Set(selectedRows);
   305‚Üí    if (newSelected.has(id)) {
   306‚Üí      newSelected.delete(id);
   307‚Üí    } else {
   308‚Üí      newSelected.add(id);
   309‚Üí    }
   310‚Üí    setSelectedRows(newSelected);
   311‚Üí  };
   312‚Üí
   313‚Üí  // Handle select all
   314‚Üí  const handleSelectAll = () => {
   315‚Üí    if (selectedRows.size === paginatedData.length) {
   316‚Üí      setSelectedRows(new Set());
   317‚Üí    } else {
   318‚Üí      setSelectedRows(new Set(paginatedData.map(item => item.keyword_id)));
   319‚Üí    }
   320‚Üí  };
   321‚Üí
   322‚Üí  // Column Pagination Components - Define before use
   323‚Üí  // Bar 1: Columns per page quantity selector
   324‚Üí  const ColumnPaginationBar1 = () => {
   325‚Üí    return (
   326‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center">
   327‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center">
   328‚Üí          <span className="text-xs text-gray-600 mr-2">Cols/page:</span>
   329‚Üí          <button
   330‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   331‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(0);
   332‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   333‚Üí            }}
   334‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-l -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   335‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 0 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   336‚Üí            }`}
   337‚Üí            style={{ 
   338‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   339‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   340‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',

   342‚Üí            }}

   350‚Üí            }}
   351‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${

   353‚Üí            }`}
   354‚Üí            style={{ 
   355‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   356‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px',

   359‚Üí            }}

   361‚Üí            4
