   367‚Üí            }}
   368‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   369‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 6 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   370‚Üí            }`}
   371‚Üí            style={{ 
   372‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   373‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   374‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   375‚Üí              backgroundColor: columnsPerPage === 6 ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   376‚Üí            }}
   377‚Üí          >
   378‚Üí            6
   379‚Üí          </button>
   380‚Üí          <button
   381‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   382‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(8);
   383‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   384‚Üí            }}
   385‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   386‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 8 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   387‚Üí            }`}
   388‚Üí            style={{ 
   389‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   390‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   391‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   392‚Üí              backgroundColor: columnsPerPage === 8 ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   393‚Üí            }}
   394‚Üí          >
   395‚Üí            8
   396‚Üí          </button>
   397‚Üí          <button
   398‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   399‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(10);
   400‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   401‚Üí            }}
   402‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   403‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 10 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   404‚Üí            }`}
   405‚Üí            style={{ 
   406‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   407‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   408‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   409‚Üí              backgroundColor: columnsPerPage === 10 ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   410‚Üí            }}
   411‚Üí          >
   412‚Üí            10
   413‚Üí          </button>
   414‚Üí          <button
   415‚Üí            onClick={() => {
   416‚Üí              setColumnsPerPage(12);
   417‚Üí              setCurrentColumnPage(1);
   418‚Üí            }}
   419‚Üí            className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-r cursor-pointer ${
   420‚Üí              columnsPerPage === 12 ? 'text-black border-black' : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   421‚Üí            }`}
   422‚Üí            style={{ 
   423‚Üí              fontSize: '14px', 
   424‚Üí              paddingTop: '10px', 
   425‚Üí              paddingBottom: '10px',
   426‚Üí              backgroundColor: columnsPerPage === 12 ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   427‚Üí            }}
   428‚Üí          >
   429‚Üí            12
   430‚Üí          </button>
   431‚Üí        </div>
   432‚Üí      </div>
   433‚Üí    );
   434‚Üí  };
   435‚Üí
   436‚Üí  // Bar 2: Current column page selector
   437‚Üí  const ColumnPaginationBar2 = () => {
   438‚Üí    if (totalColumnPages <= 1) return null;
   439‚Üí    
   440‚Üí    return (
   441‚Üí      <div className="flex items-center">
   442‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center">
   443‚Üí          <span className="text-xs text-gray-600 mr-2">Col page:</span>
   444‚Üí          <button
   445‚Üí            onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(1)}
   446‚Üí            disabled={currentColumnPage === 1}
   447‚Üí            className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-l -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   448‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   449‚Üí          >
   450‚Üí            First
   451‚Üí          </button>
   452‚Üí          <button
   453‚Üí            onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(currentColumnPage - 1)}
   454‚Üí            disabled={currentColumnPage === 1}
   455‚Üí            className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   456‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   457‚Üí          >
   458‚Üí            Prev
   459‚Üí          </button>
   460‚Üí          
   461‚Üí          {Array.from({ length: Math.min(5, totalColumnPages) }, (_, i) => {
   462‚Üí            const pageNum = Math.max(1, Math.min(totalColumnPages - 4, currentColumnPage - 2)) + i;
   463‚Üí            if (pageNum > totalColumnPages) return null;
   464‚Üí            return (
   465‚Üí              <button
   466‚Üí                key={pageNum}
   467‚Üí                onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(pageNum)}
   468‚Üí                className={`px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px cursor-pointer ${
   469‚Üí                  currentColumnPage === pageNum 
   470‚Üí                    ? 'text-black border-black' 
   471‚Üí                    : 'bg-white hover:bg-gray-200'
   472‚Üí                }`}
   473‚Üí                style={{ 
   474‚Üí                  fontSize: '14px', 
   475‚Üí                  paddingTop: '10px', 
   476‚Üí                  paddingBottom: '10px',
   477‚Üí                  backgroundColor: currentColumnPage === pageNum ? '#f8f782' : undefined
   478‚Üí                }}
   479‚Üí              >
   480‚Üí                {pageNum}
   481‚Üí              </button>
   482‚Üí            );
   483‚Üí          })}
   484‚Üí          
   485‚Üí          <button
   486‚Üí            onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(currentColumnPage + 1)}
   487‚Üí            disabled={currentColumnPage === totalColumnPages}
   488‚Üí            className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border -mr-px disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   489‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   490‚Üí          >
   491‚Üí            Next
   492‚Üí          </button>
   493‚Üí          <button
   494‚Üí            onClick={() => setCurrentColumnPage(totalColumnPages)}
   495‚Üí            disabled={currentColumnPage === totalColumnPages}
   496‚Üí            className="px-2 py-2.5 text-sm border rounded-r disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed cursor-pointer bg-white hover:bg-gray-200"
   497‚Üí            style={{ fontSize: '14px', paddingTop: '10px', paddingBottom: '10px' }}
   498‚Üí          >
   499‚Üí            Last
   500‚Üí          </button>
   501‚Üí        </div>
   502‚Üí      </div>
   503‚Üí    );
   504‚Üí  };
   505‚Üí
   506‚Üí  // Pass pagination components to parent
   507‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   508‚Üí    if (onColumnPaginationRender) {
   509‚Üí      onColumnPaginationRender({
   510‚Üí        ColumnPaginationBar1,
   511‚Üí        ColumnPaginationBar2
   512‚Üí      });
   513‚Üí    }
   514‚Üí  }, [onColumnPaginationRender, currentColumnPage, totalColumnPages, columnsPerPage]);
   515‚Üí
   516‚Üí  // Notify parent of column pagination changes
   517‚Üí  useEffect(() => {
   518‚Üí    if (onColumnPaginationChange) {
   519‚Üí      onColumnPaginationChange(columnsPerPage, currentColumnPage);
   520‚Üí    }
   521‚Üí  }, [columnsPerPage, currentColumnPage, onColumnPaginationChange]);
   522‚Üí
   523‚Üí  // Inline editing functions
   524‚Üí  const startEditing = (id: number, field: string, currentValue: any) => {
   525‚Üí    setEditingCell({ id, field });
   526‚Üí    setEditingValue(currentValue?.toString() || '');
   527‚Üí  };
   528‚Üí
   529‚Üí  const saveEdit = async () => {
   530‚Üí    if (!editingCell || !userInternalId) return;
   531‚Üí    
   532‚Üí    try {
   533‚Üí      let value: any = editingValue;
   534‚Üí      
   535‚Üí      // Convert value based on field type
   536‚Üí      const column = columns.find(col => col.key === editingCell.field);
   537‚Üí      if (column?.type === 'number') {
   538‚Üí        value = editingValue === '' ? null : Number(editingValue);
   539‚Üí      }
   540‚Üí
   541‚Üí      const { error } = await supabase
   542‚Üí        .from('keywordshub')
   543‚Üí        .update({ 
   544‚Üí          [editingCell.field]: value,
   545‚Üí          last_updated_by: userInternalId
   546‚Üí        })
   547‚Üí        .eq('keyword_id', editingCell.id);
   548‚Üí
   549‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
   550‚Üí
   551‚Üí      // Update local data
   552‚Üí      setData(prevData => 
   553‚Üí        prevData.map(item => 
   554‚Üí          item.keyword_id === editingCell.id 
   555‚Üí            ? { ...item, [editingCell.field]: value, updated_at: new Date().toISOString() }
   556‚Üí            : item
   557‚Üí        )
   558‚Üí      );
   559‚Üí
   560‚Üí      setEditingCell(null);
   561‚Üí      setEditingValue('');
   562‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   563‚Üí      console.error('Error updating field:', error);
   564‚Üí      alert('Failed to update field');
   565‚Üí    }
   566‚Üí  };
   567‚Üí
   568‚Üí  const cancelEdit = () => {
   569‚Üí    setEditingCell(null);
   570‚Üí    setEditingValue('');
   571‚Üí  };
   572‚Üí
   573‚Üí  // DataForSEO refresh function (Live endpoint)
   574‚Üí  const refreshDataForSEO = async (keywordId: number) => {
   575‚Üí    setRefreshingKeywords(prev => new Set([...prev, keywordId]));
   576‚Üí    
   577‚Üí    try {
   578‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/dataforseo-refresh-live', {
   579‚Üí        method: 'POST',
   580‚Üí        headers: {
   581‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   582‚Üí        },
   583‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({ keyword_id: keywordId }),
   584‚Üí      });
   585‚Üí
   586‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
   587‚Üí
   588‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   589‚Üí        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to refresh data');
   590‚Üí      }
   591‚Üí
   592‚Üí      // Update local data with refreshed values
   593‚Üí      setData(prevData => 
   594‚Üí        prevData.map(item => 
   595‚Üí          item.keyword_id === keywordId 
   596‚Üí            ? { 
   597‚Üí                ...item, 
   598‚Üí                ...result.data,
   599‚Üí                updated_at: new Date().toISOString() 
   600‚Üí              }
   601‚Üí            : item
   602‚Üí        )
   603‚Üí      );
   604‚Üí
   605‚Üí      console.log('‚úÖ DataForSEO data refreshed for keyword:', keywordId);
   606‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   607‚Üí      console.error('‚ùå Failed to refresh DataForSEO data:', error);
   608‚Üí      alert(`Failed to refresh data: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   609‚Üí    } finally {
   610‚Üí      setRefreshingKeywords(prev => {
   611‚Üí        const newSet = new Set(prev);
   612‚Üí        newSet.delete(keywordId);
   613‚Üí        return newSet;
   614‚Üí      });
   615‚Üí    }
   616‚Üí  };
   617‚Üí
   618‚Üí  // Bulk refresh function
   619‚Üí  const bulkRefreshMetrics = async () => {
   620‚Üí    setBulkRefreshing(true);
   621‚Üí    
   622‚Üí    try {
   623‚Üí      // Get selected keywords
   624‚Üí      const selectedKeywordIds = Array.from(selectedRows);
   625‚Üí      if (selectedKeywordIds.length === 0) {
   626‚Üí        alert('Please select keywords to refresh');
   627‚Üí        return;
   628‚Üí      }
   629‚Üí
   630‚Üí      console.log(`üöÄ Starting bulk refresh for ${selectedKeywordIds.length} keywords...`);
   631‚Üí      console.log('üìã Keyword IDs:', selectedKeywordIds.slice(0, 10), selectedKeywordIds.length > 10 ? `... and ${selectedKeywordIds.length - 10} more` : '');
   632‚Üí
   633‚Üí      const startTime = Date.now();
   634‚Üí      
   635‚Üí      // Create timeout promise
   636‚Üí      const timeoutPromise = new Promise((_, reject) => {
   637‚Üí        setTimeout(() => {
   638‚Üí          reject(new Error(`Request timeout after 120 seconds (${selectedKeywordIds.length} keywords)`));
   639‚Üí        }, 120000); // 2 minutes timeout
   640‚Üí      });
   641‚Üí
   642‚Üí      const requestPayload = {
   643‚Üí        keyword_ids: selectedKeywordIds,
   644‚Üí        field: 'cpc'
   645‚Üí      };
   646‚Üí      
   647‚Üí      console.log(`üì¶ Request payload size: ${JSON.stringify(requestPayload).length} characters`);
   648‚Üí
   649‚Üí      // Race between fetch and timeout
   650‚Üí      const fetchPromise = fetch('/api/dataforseo-refresh-bulk', {
   651‚Üí        method: 'POST',
   652‚Üí        headers: {
   653‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   654‚Üí        },
   655‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify(requestPayload),
   656‚Üí      });
   657‚Üí
   658‚Üí      const response = await Promise.race([fetchPromise, timeoutPromise]) as Response;
   659‚Üí      const fetchTime = Date.now() - startTime;
   660‚Üí      
   661‚Üí      console.log(`‚è±Ô∏è Fetch completed in ${fetchTime}ms (${(fetchTime / 1000).toFixed(1)}s)`);
   662‚Üí      console.log(`üì° Response status: ${response.status} ${response.statusText}`);
   663‚Üí
   664‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   665‚Üí        const errorText = await response.text();
   666‚Üí        console.error(`‚ùå API Error Response (${response.status}):`, errorText);
   667‚Üí        throw new Error(`API Error ${response.status}: ${errorText}`);
   668‚Üí      }
   669‚Üí
   670‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
   671‚Üí      const totalTime = Date.now() - startTime;
   672‚Üí      
   673‚Üí      console.log(`‚úÖ Full request completed in ${totalTime}ms (${(totalTime / 1000).toFixed(1)}s)`);
   674‚Üí      console.log('üìä API Response:', result);
   675‚Üí
   676‚Üí      // Enhanced success message with actual processing details
   677‚Üí      const successMsg = `‚úÖ BULK REFRESH COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY\n\n` +
   678‚Üí        `üéØ Keywords Processed: ${selectedKeywordIds.length}\n` +
   679‚Üí        `‚è±Ô∏è  Processing Time: ${(totalTime / 1000).toFixed(1)} seconds\n` +
   680‚Üí        `üìä Status: ${result.message || 'Processing initiated'}\n\n` +
   681‚Üí        `üîç Background processing has been initiated.\n` +
   682‚Üí        `üìà Updated metrics will appear in the table shortly.\n\n` +
   683‚Üí        `üí° The system successfully processed your large batch!`;
   684‚Üí      
   685‚Üí      alert(successMsg);
   686‚Üí      
   687‚Üí      // Refresh the table data after a delay to show updated metrics
   688‚Üí      setTimeout(() => {
   689‚Üí        console.log('üîÑ Refreshing table data to show updated metrics...');
   690‚Üí        fetchData();
   691‚Üí      }, 5000);
   692‚Üí
   693‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   694‚Üí      const errorMessage = error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error';
   695‚Üí      console.error('‚ùå Bulk refresh failed:', {
   696‚Üí        error: errorMessage,
   697‚Üí        keywordCount: Array.from(selectedRows).length,
   698‚Üí        timestamp: new Date().toISOString()
   699‚Üí      });
   700‚Üí      
   701‚Üí      // More detailed error message for user
   702‚Üí      alert(`Failed to start bulk refresh: ${errorMessage}\n\nKeywords: ${Array.from(selectedRows).length}\nTime: ${new Date().toLocaleTimeString()}\n\nCheck console for details.`);
   703‚Üí    } finally {
   704‚Üí      setBulkRefreshing(false);
   705‚Üí    }
   706‚Üí  };
   707‚Üí
   708‚Üí  // Bulk refresh function for blank keywords only
   709‚Üí  const bulkRefreshBlanks = async () => {
   710‚Üí    setBlankRefreshing(true);
   711‚Üí    
   712‚Üí    try {
   713‚Üí      // Filter keywords that have blank/null cpc OR search_volume
   714‚Üí      const blankKeywordIds = data
   715‚Üí        .filter(keyword => 
   716‚Üí          (keyword.cpc === null || keyword.cpc === undefined) || 
   717‚Üí          (keyword.search_volume === null || keyword.search_volume === undefined)
   718‚Üí        )
   719‚Üí        .map(keyword => keyword.keyword_id);
   720‚Üí
   721‚Üí      if (blankKeywordIds.length === 0) {
   722‚Üí        alert('No keywords with blank CPC or search volume found.');
   723‚Üí        return;
   724‚Üí      }
   725‚Üí
   726‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/dataforseo-refresh-bulk', {
   727‚Üí        method: 'POST',
   728‚Üí        headers: {
   729‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   730‚Üí        },
   731‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({ 
   732‚Üí          keyword_ids: blankKeywordIds,
   733‚Üí          field: 'cpc'
   734‚Üí        }),
   735‚Üí      });
   736‚Üí
   737‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
   738‚Üí
   739‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   740‚Üí        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to start bulk refresh');
   741‚Üí      }
   742‚Üí
   743‚Üí      alert(`Bulk refresh started for ${blankKeywordIds.length} keywords with blank data. Results will be available shortly.`);
   744‚Üí      
   745‚Üí      // Refresh the table data after a delay
   746‚Üí      setTimeout(() => {
   747‚Üí        fetchData();
   748‚Üí      }, 5000);
   749‚Üí
   750‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   751‚Üí      console.error('‚ùå Failed to start blank refresh:', error);
   752‚Üí      alert(`Failed to start blank refresh: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   753‚Üí    } finally {
   754‚Üí      setBlankRefreshing(false);
   755‚Üí    }
   756‚Üí  };
   757‚Üí
   758‚Üí  // Reverse lookup refresh function
   759‚Üí  const bulkRefreshReverseLookup = async () => {
   760‚Üí    setReverseLookupRefreshing(true);
   761‚Üí    
   762‚Üí    try {
   763‚Üí      // Get all visible keyword IDs (or selected if any)
   764‚Üí      const targetKeywordIds = selectedRows.size > 0 
   765‚Üí        ? Array.from(selectedRows) 
   766‚Üí        : paginatedData.map(keyword => keyword.keyword_id);
   767‚Üí
   768‚Üí      if (targetKeywordIds.length === 0) {
   769‚Üí        alert('No keywords available for reverse lookup refresh.');
   770‚Üí        return;
   771‚Üí      }
   772‚Üí
   773‚Üí      console.log(`üîç Starting reverse lookup refresh for ${targetKeywordIds.length} keywords...`);
   774‚Üí      const startTime = Date.now();
   775‚Üí
   776‚Üí      const response = await fetch('/api/reverse-lookup-refresh', {
   777‚Üí        method: 'POST',
   778‚Üí        headers: {
   779‚Üí          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
   780‚Üí        },
   781‚Üí        body: JSON.stringify({ 
   782‚Üí          keyword_ids: targetKeywordIds
   783‚Üí        }),
   784‚Üí      });
   785‚Üí
   786‚Üí      const result = await response.json();
   787‚Üí      const totalTime = Date.now() - startTime;
   788‚Üí
   789‚Üí      if (!response.ok) {
   790‚Üí        throw new Error(result.error || 'Failed to refresh reverse lookup');
   791‚Üí      }
   792‚Üí
   793‚Üí      console.log(`‚úÖ Reverse lookup refresh completed in ${totalTime}ms`);
   794‚Üí      console.log('üìä Result:', result);
   795‚Üí
   796‚Üí      alert(`‚úÖ Reverse lookup refresh completed!\n\n` +
   797‚Üí            `üìä Keywords processed: ${targetKeywordIds.length}\n` +
   798‚Üí            `‚è±Ô∏è  Processing time: ${(totalTime / 1000).toFixed(1)}s\n` +
   799‚Üí            `üîç Updated: ${result.updated || 0} cached values\n\n` +
   800‚Üí            `The reverse lookup cache has been updated.`);
   801‚Üí      
   802‚Üí      // Refresh the table data to show updated cached values
   803‚Üí      setTimeout(() => {
   804‚Üí        fetchData();
   805‚Üí      }, 1000);
   806‚Üí
   807‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   808‚Üí      console.error('‚ùå Failed to refresh reverse lookup:', error);
   809‚Üí      alert(`Failed to refresh reverse lookup: ${error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   810‚Üí    } finally {
   811‚Üí      setReverseLookupRefreshing(false);
   812‚Üí    }
   813‚Üí  };
   814‚Üí
   815‚Üí  // Create new inline record
   816‚Üí  const createNewInline = async () => {
   817‚Üí    if (!userInternalId) return;
   818‚Üí
   819‚Üí    try {
   820‚Üí      const newRecord = {
   821‚Üí        keyword_datum: 'New Keyword',
   822‚Üí        search_volume: null,
   823‚Üí        cpc: null,
   824‚Üí        location_display_name: null,
   825‚Üí        location_coordinate: null,
   826‚Üí        language_code: 'en',
   827‚Üí        language_name: 'English',
   828‚Üí        competition: null,
   829‚Üí        competition_index: null,
   830‚Üí        low_top_of_page_bid: null,
   831‚Üí        high_top_of_page_bid: null,
   832‚Üí        api_fetched_at: null,
   833‚Üí        created_by: userInternalId,
   834‚Üí        last_updated_by: userInternalId
   835‚Üí      };
   836‚Üí
   837‚Üí      const { data: inserted, error } = await supabase
   838‚Üí        .from('keywordshub')
   839‚Üí        .insert([newRecord])
   840‚Üí        .select()
   841‚Üí        .single();
   842‚Üí
   843‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
   844‚Üí
   845‚Üí      // Add to local data at the beginning
   846‚Üí      setData(prevData => [inserted, ...prevData]);
   847‚Üí      
   848‚Üí      // Start editing the keyword_datum field immediately
   849‚Üí      setTimeout(() => {
   850‚Üí        startEditing(inserted.keyword_id, 'keyword_datum', 'New Keyword');
   851‚Üí      }, 100);
   852‚Üí
   853‚Üí    } catch (error) {
   854‚Üí      console.error('Error creating record:', error);
   855‚Üí      alert('Failed to create record');
   856‚Üí    }
   857‚Üí  };
   858‚Üí
   859‚Üí  // Handle popup form creation
   860‚Üí  const handleCreate = async () => {
   861‚Üí    if (!userInternalId) return;
   862‚Üí
   863‚Üí    try {
   864‚Üí      const insertData = {
   865‚Üí        ...formData,
   866‚Üí        search_volume: formData.search_volume || null,
   867‚Üí        cpc: formData.cpc || null,
   868‚Üí        competition_index: formData.competition_index || null,
   869‚Üí        low_top_of_page_bid: formData.low_top_of_page_bid || null,
   870‚Üí        high_top_of_page_bid: formData.high_top_of_page_bid || null,
   871‚Üí        created_by: userInternalId,
   872‚Üí        last_updated_by: userInternalId
   873‚Üí      };
   874‚Üí      
   875‚Üí      const { error } = await supabase
   876‚Üí        .from('keywordshub')
   877‚Üí        .insert([insertData]);
   878‚Üí        
   879‚Üí      if (error) throw error;
   880‚Üí      
   881‚Üí      setIsCreateModalOpen(false);
   882‚Üí      resetForm();
   883‚Üí      fetchData();
   884‚Üí    } catch (err) {
   885‚Üí      console.error('Error creating record:', err);
   886‚Üí      alert(`Failed to create record: ${err instanceof Error ? err.message : 'Unknown error'}`);
   887‚Üí    }
   888‚Üí  };
   889‚Üí
   890‚Üí  // Reset form
   891‚Üí  const resetForm = () => {
   892‚Üí    setFormData({
   893‚Üí      keyword_datum: '',
   894‚Üí      search_volume: 0,
   895‚Üí      cpc: 0,
   896‚Üí      rel_dfs_location_code: 2840,
   897‚Üí      location_display_name: '',
   898‚Üí      location_coordinate: '',
   899‚Üí      language_code: 'en',
   900‚Üí      language_name: 'English',
   901‚Üí      competition: '',
   902‚Üí      competition_index: 0,
   903‚Üí      low_top_of_page_bid: 0,
   904‚Üí      high_top_of_page_bid: 0
   905‚Üí    });
   906‚Üí  };
   907‚Üí
   908‚Üí  // Render cell content
   909‚Üí  const renderCell = (item: KeywordRecord, column: typeof columns[0]) => {
   910‚Üí    const value = item[column.key as keyof KeywordRecord];
   911‚Üí    const isEditing = editingCell?.id === item.keyword_id && editingCell?.field === column.key;
   912‚Üí    const isReadOnly = column.key === 'keyword_id' || column.key === 'created_at' || column.key === 'updated_at';
   913‚Üí
   914‚Üí    if (isEditing && !isReadOnly) {
   915‚Üí      return (
   916‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
   917‚Üí          <input
   918‚Üí            type={column.type === 'number' ? 'number' : 'text'}
   919‚Üí            value={editingValue}
   920‚Üí            onChange={(e) => setEditingValue(e.target.value)}
   921‚Üí            onKeyDown={(e) => {
   922‚Üí              if (e.key === 'Enter') saveEdit();
   923‚Üí              if (e.key === 'Escape') cancelEdit();
   924‚Üí            }}
   925‚Üí            className="w-full px-2 py-1 text-xs border border-blue-500 rounded focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500"
   926‚Üí            autoFocus
   927‚Üí          />
   928‚Üí          <button
   929‚Üí            onClick={saveEdit}
   930‚Üí            className="text-green-600 hover:text-green-800 text-xs"
   931‚Üí          >
   932‚Üí            ‚úì
   933‚Üí          </button>
   934‚Üí          <button
   935‚Üí            onClick={cancelEdit}
   936‚Üí            className="text-red-600 hover:text-red-800 text-xs"
   937‚Üí          >
   938‚Üí            ‚úï
   939‚Üí          </button>
   940‚Üí        </div>
   941‚Üí      );
   942‚Üí    }
   943‚Üí
   944‚Üí    const cellClass = "px-2 py-1 cursor-pointer hover:bg-blue-50 text-xs";
   945‚Üí    
   946‚Üí    if (column.type === 'datetime' && value) {
   947‚Üí      return (
   948‚Üí        <div
   949‚Üí          className={cellClass}
   950‚Üí          onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
   951‚Üí        >
   952‚Üí          {new Date(value as string).toLocaleString()}
   953‚Üí        </div>
   954‚Üí      );
   955‚Üí    }
   956‚Üí
   957‚Üí    if (column.type === 'number' && value !== null) {
   958‚Üí      // Special handling for search_volume and cpc columns with refresh buttons
   959‚Üí      if (column.key === 'search_volume' || column.key === 'cpc') {
   960‚Üí        const isRefreshing = refreshingKeywords.has(item.keyword_id);
   961‚Üí        
   962‚Üí        return (
   963‚Üí          <div className="flex items-center justify-between space-x-2">
   964‚Üí            <div
   965‚Üí              className={cellClass}
   966‚Üí              onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
   967‚Üí            >
   968‚Üí              {typeof value === 'number' ? value.toLocaleString() : value}
   969‚Üí            </div>
   970‚Üí            <button
   971‚Üí              onClick={(e) => {
   972‚Üí                e.stopPropagation();
   973‚Üí                refreshDataForSEO(item.keyword_id);
   974‚Üí              }}
   975‚Üí              disabled={isRefreshing}
   976‚Üí              className={`flex-shrink-0 w-6 h-6 flex items-center justify-center rounded text-white transition-colors ${
   977‚Üí                isRefreshing 
   978‚Üí                  ? 'bg-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed' 
   979‚Üí                  : 'bg-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-700'
   980‚Üí              }`}
   981‚Üí              title="Refresh data from DataForSEO"
   982‚Üí            >
   983‚Üí              {isRefreshing ? (
   984‚Üí                <svg className="animate-spin h-3 w-3" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
   985‚Üí                  <circle className="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="4"></circle>
   986‚Üí                  <path className="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path>
   987‚Üí                </svg>
   988‚Üí              ) : (
   989‚Üí                <svg className="h-3 w-3" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
   990‚Üí                  <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M4 4v5h.582m15.356 2A8.001 8.001 0 004.582 9m0 0H9m11 11v-5h-.581m0 0a8.003 8.003 0 01-15.357-2m15.357 2H15" />
   991‚Üí                </svg>
   992‚Üí              )}
   993‚Üí            </button>
   994‚Üí          </div>
   995‚Üí        );
   996‚Üí      }
   997‚Üí      
   998‚Üí      return (
   999‚Üí        <div
  1000‚Üí          className={cellClass}
  1001‚Üí          onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
  1002‚Üí        >
  1003‚Üí          {typeof value === 'number' ? (column.key === 'rel_dfs_location_code' ? value.toString() : value.toLocaleString()) : value}
  1004‚Üí        </div>
  1005‚Üí      );
  1006‚Üí    }
  1007‚Üí
  1008‚Üí    // Special handling for search_volume and cpc columns with refresh buttons (when null/empty)
  1009‚Üí    if (column.key === 'search_volume' || column.key === 'cpc') {
  1010‚Üí      const isRefreshing = refreshingKeywords.has(item.keyword_id);
  1011‚Üí      
  1012‚Üí      return (
  1013‚Üí        <div className="flex items-center justify-between space-x-2">
  1014‚Üí          <div
  1015‚Üí            className={cellClass}
  1016‚Üí            onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
  1017‚Üí          >
  1018‚Üí            {value?.toString() || ''}
  1019‚Üí          </div>
  1020‚Üí          <button
  1021‚Üí            onClick={(e) => {
  1022‚Üí              e.stopPropagation();
  1023‚Üí              refreshDataForSEO(item.keyword_id);
  1024‚Üí            }}
  1025‚Üí            disabled={isRefreshing}
  1026‚Üí            className={`flex-shrink-0 w-6 h-6 flex items-center justify-center rounded text-white transition-colors ${
  1027‚Üí              isRefreshing 
  1028‚Üí                ? 'bg-gray-400 cursor-not-allowed' 
  1029‚Üí                : 'bg-gray-600 hover:bg-gray-700'
  1030‚Üí            }`}
  1031‚Üí            title="Refresh data from DataForSEO"
  1032‚Üí          >
  1033‚Üí            {isRefreshing ? (
  1034‚Üí              <svg className="animate-spin h-3 w-3" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  1035‚Üí                <circle className="opacity-25" cx="12" cy="12" r="10" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="4"></circle>
  1036‚Üí                <path className="opacity-75" fill="currentColor" d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"></path>
  1037‚Üí              </svg>
  1038‚Üí            ) : (
  1039‚Üí              <svg className="h-3 w-3" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
  1040‚Üí                <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M4 4v5h.582m15.356 2A8.001 8.001 0 004.582 9m0 0H9m11 11v-5h-.581m0 0a8.003 8.003 0 01-15.357-2m15.357 2H15" />
  1041‚Üí              </svg>
  1042‚Üí            )}
  1043‚Üí          </button>
  1044‚Üí        </div>
  1045‚Üí      );
  1046‚Üí    }
  1047‚Üí
  1048‚Üí    // Special handling for tags column
  1049‚Üí    if (column.key === 'tags') {
  1050‚Üí      const tags = item.tags || [];
  1051‚Üí      return (
  1052‚Üí        <div className="px-2 py-1 text-xs">
  1053‚Üí          {tags.length > 0 ? (
  1054‚Üí            <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-1">
  1055‚Üí              {tags.map((tag) => (
  1056‚Üí                <div
  1057‚Üí                  key={tag.tag_id}
  1058‚Üí                  className="inline-flex px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium"
  1059‚Üí                  style={{ backgroundColor: '#ffffe0', color: '#333' }}
  1060‚Üí                  title={`Tag ID: ${tag.tag_id}`}
  1061‚Üí                >
  1062‚Üí                  ({tag.tag_id}) - {tag.tag_name}
  1063‚Üí                </div>
  1064‚Üí              ))}
  1065‚Üí            </div>
  1066‚Üí          ) : (
  1067‚Üí            <span className="text-gray-400">No tags</span>
  1068‚Üí          )}
  1069‚Üí        </div>
  1070‚Üí      );
  1071‚Üí    }
  1072‚Üí
  1073‚Üí    // Special handling for SERP tool column
  1074‚Üí    if (column.key === 'serp_tool') {
  1075‚Üí      return (
  1076‚Üí        <div className="px-2 py-1 flex items-center justify-center">
  1077‚Üí          <button
  1078‚Üí            onClick={() => {
  1079‚Üí              window.open(`/serpjar?keyword_id=${item.keyword_id}`, '_blank');
  1080‚Üí            }}
  1081‚Üí            className="w-4 h-4 bg-black text-white font-bold text-xs flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-gray-800 transition-colors"
  1082‚Üí            title={`Open SERP tool for keyword: ${item.keyword_datum}`}
  1083‚Üí          >
  1084‚Üí            S
  1085‚Üí          </button>
  1086‚Üí        </div>
  1087‚Üí      );
  1088‚Üí    }
  1089‚Üí
  1090‚Üí    // Special handling for reverse lookup column
  1091‚Üí    if (column.key === 'reverse_lookup') {
  1092‚Üí      const cachedIds = item.cached_cncglub_ids;
  1093‚Üí      return (
  1094‚Üí        <div className="px-2 py-1 text-xs">
  1095‚Üí          {cachedIds ? (
  1096‚Üí            <span className="text-blue-600 font-medium">
  1097‚Üí              {cachedIds.replace(/,/g, '/')}
  1098‚Üí            </span>
  1099‚Üí          ) : (
  1100‚Üí            <span className="text-gray-400 italic">not cached</span>
  1101‚Üí          )}
  1102‚Üí        </div>
  1103‚Üí      );
  1104‚Üí    }
  1105‚Üí
  1106‚Üí    return (
  1107‚Üí      <div
  1108‚Üí        className={cellClass}
  1109‚Üí        onClick={() => !isReadOnly && startEditing(item.keyword_id, column.key, value)}
  1110‚Üí      >
  1111‚Üí        {value?.toString() || ''}
  1112‚Üí      </div>
  1113‚Üí    );
  1114‚Üí  };
  1115‚Üí
  1116‚Üí  // Pagination Controls Component - Matching /filejar style
  1117‚Üí  const PaginationControls = () => {

  1127‚Üí            }}
